procurement_insights_agent.name: Procurement Insights Agent
procurement_insights_agent.description: Answers natural-language questions about PR/PO statuses, TAT metrics, SLA compliance, approval chain progress, and bottleneck identification using data fetched from SAP

compliance_trail_agent.name: Compliance Trail Agent
compliance_trail_agent.description: Retrieves and explains DOA approval records, SOP compliance history, and generates audit-ready summaries by querying SAP approval logs and document trails

grievance_agent.name: Grievance Agent
grievance_agent.description: Helps users raise procurement grievances (approval delays, policy/compliance concerns), categorizes them, tracks resolution status, and notifies relevant stakeholders
